channel.title: Class Idea: Treasonist
channel.description:
Name: Treasonist Faction: Neutral Day Abilities: Stolen Paper: You can forge a copy of someone's journal when they die (Limited Use)
Night Abilities: Copycat: Disguise yourself as a blue dragon member tonight (Limited Use)
Weaknesses: He can be attacked by unseen or cult members.
Lore: As a kid you dreamed of becoming rich and powerful, but since you were born in a poor family outside of the royal bloodline your chances of becoming one were close to none. Because of this knowledge your blood boiled with hatred and jealousy. In other words you want to see him be killed.
How this character wins: The character's target will always be the king. It does not matter what faction the king belongs to, you just have to get the king executed. If your target dies, you will have to wait until another king is chosen.
after the king is executed you win
